snippet: JUDELL--Robert. The Harmonie Club notes with sorrow the passing of our honored member Robert B. Judell. We extend our heartfelt condolences to his entire family. Philip R. Cowen, President The Harmonie Club 1/3
lead_paragraph: JUDELL--Robert. The Harmonie Club notes with sorrow the passing of our honored member Robert B. Judell. We extend our heartfelt condolences to his entire family. Philip R. Cowen, President The Harmonie Club 1/3
